attributes.action: Make it illegal that 16year olds can legally buy knives. It should be legal that knives should be legally sold to those who are 18+
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment, it is illegal for any shop to sell a knife to anyone under the age of 16, although some kinds of knives aren't covered by this law. Only cutlery knives should be sold to those of the age of 16+. All other knives should be legally sold to those over 18.
There has been so much crime involving teenagers and knife attacks.. Please sign this petition to help stop crime and save lives.. Thank you..
